revision.text:
{{wiktionary|Eve|eve}} '''[[Eve]]''' is the first woman created by God according to the creation narrative of Abrahamic religions.
'''Eve''' may also refer to: {{TOC right}} == People == {{Main|Eve (name)}} {{solename}} * [[Eve (rapper)]] (born 1978), American recording artist and actress * [[Eve (wrestler)]] (born 1984), American professional wrestler * [[Mitochondrial Eve]], the matrilineal most recent common ancestor of modern humans * [[Eve (Japanese singer)]], a Vocaloid producer and Japanese singer-songwriter.
== Places == * [[Eve Cone]], a volcano in British Columbia, Canada * [[Ève, Oise]], a commune in the Oise département of France * [[Eve, Kentucky]], an unincorporated community * [[Eve, Missouri]], an unincorporated community
== Technology == * [[Eve (cryptography)]], a placeholder name for an archetypal eavesdropper * [[EVE/ZeBu]], a provider of hardware-assisted verification tools * [[Eve (robot)]], a robot scientist working at Aberystwyth University * [[EVE (text editor)]], a text editor provided with the VMS operating system * [[VMS Eve|VMS ''Eve'']], a spacecraft * [[European Venus Explorer]], a proposed space probe * Eve, a typeface created by [[Rudolf Koch]] * ''Eve'', a video game created in association with and featuring the music of [[Peter Gabriel]] * [[Eve Systems]], German smart home product brand and manufacturer
==Books and magazines== * [[Eve (magazine)|''Eve'' (magazine)]], a monthly women's magazine * [[Eve (Chase novel)|''Eve'' (Chase novel)]], a 1945 psychological thriller novel by James Hadley Chase * [[Eve (Young novel)|''Eve'' (Young novel)]], a 2015 Christian fantasy novel by William P. Young
== Film and television == * [[The Three Faces of Eve]], a 1957 American mystery drama film * [[Eve (1968 film)|''Eve'' (1968 film)]], a thriller film * [[Eve (2008 film)|''Eve'' (2008 film)]], a short film by Natalie Portman * [[Eve (U.S. TV series)|''Eve'' (U.S. TV series)]], a 2003–2006 American television sitcom * [[Eve (UK TV series)|''Eve'' (UK TV series)]], a 2015–2017 British children's TV programme * [[Eve (Mauritian TV series)|''Eve'' (Mauritian TV series)]] * [[Eve (The X-Files)|"Eve" (''The X-Files'')]], a 1993 episode of ''The X-Files'' * "Eve", an episode of ''[[Journey to the Unknown]]''
===Fictional characters and items=== * [[Eve (Angel)|Eve (''Angel'')]], a character in the Joss Whedon TV series ''Angel'' * [[Eve (Black Cat)|Eve (''Black Cat'')]], a character in the 2000–2004 manga series ''Black Cat'' * [[Eve (comics)]], a character in the Neil Gaiman comic book series ''The Sandman'' * [[Eve (The X-Files)|Eve (''The X-Files'')]], the name of multiple female clones in the TV series ''The X-Files'' * [[EVE (WALL-E)|EVE (''WALL-E'')]], a character in the 2008 Pixar film ''WALL-E'' * [[Eve (Xena)|Eve (''Xena'')]], a character in the TV series ''Xena: Warrior Princess'' * Eve, a member of the musical comedy trio [[The Kransky Sisters]] * Eve, a character in the ''[[Underworld (film series)|Underworld]]'' film series * Eve, a fictional serum in the 2007 video game ''[[BioShock]]'' * Eve Luciano, a character in the 1978–1981 manga series ''[[California Story]]'' * [[Eve Polastri]], a character in the 2018 TV series ''Killing Eve'' and related Luke Jennings novels * EVE VIII, a character in the 1991 film ''[[Eve of Destruction (film)|Eve of Destruction]]'' * Eve Wakamiya, the keyboardist of the band Pastel*Palettes in the ''[[BanG Dream!]]'' franchise * Mitochondria Eve, a [[List of Parasite Eve characters#Eve|character in the 1995 novel ''Parasite Eve'']]
== Games == * ''[[Eve: The Second Genesis Collectible Card Game]]'' * ''[[Eve Online]]'', a 2003 MMO space simulation computer game * Eve, a character in [[The Binding of Isaac (video game)|''The Binding of Isaac'']] * Eve, a character in [[List of Freedom Force characters|''Freedom Force'']]
== Music == * [[Ève (Massenet)|''Ève'' (Massenet)]], a French biblical oratorio by Jules Massenet ===Bands=== * [[Eve (American band)]] or Honey Ltd. * [[Eve (Korean band)]], a Korean visual rock band ===Albums=== * [[Eve (The Alan Parsons Project album)|''Eve'' (The Alan Parsons Project album)]] (1979) * [[Eve (Over the Rhine album)|''Eve'' (Over the Rhine album)]] (1994) * [[Eve (Showta album)|''Eve'' (Showta album)]], a 2008 album by Showta * ''Eve'', a 2010 album by [[Ufomammut]] *[[Eve (Rapsody album)|''Eve'' (Rapsody album)]], a 2019 album by Rapsody
===Songs=== * [[Eve (Idoling!!! song)|"Eve" (Idoling!!! song)]] * [[Eve (Jim Capaldi song)|"Eve" (Jim Capaldi song)]], 1972 * "Eve", song by The Carpenters from ''[[Ticket to Ride (album)|Ticket to Ride]]'', 1969 * "Eve", song by Dream Theater from ''[[Awake (Dream Theater album)|Awake]]'', 1994 * "Eve", song by [[Spacek (band)|Spacek]], 1999 * "[[Ève lève-toi]]", by Julie Pietri, 1986
==Other uses== * [[Eve (cigarette)]], a brand of cigarette * [[EVE (organization)]], a Vancouver-based advocacy group * [[Eve (Davidson)|''Eve'' (Davidson)]], a 1931 bronze sculpture by Robert Davidson * [[EVE (Sonic the Hedgehog)|EVE (''Sonic the Hedgehog'')]], a character in ''Sonic the Hedgehog'' comic books * [[Endogenous viral element]] * [[3,4-Methylenedioxy-N-ethylamphetamine]] or Eve, an empathogenic psychoactive drug * [[Harstad/Narvik Airport, Evenes]]'s IATA code * The day or night before a special day, usually a holiday, for example [[Christmas Eve]]
==See also== * [[Eaves]] * [[Eevee]], a Pokémon * [[Eevee (band)]], a Philippine band formed in 2004 * [[Eve 6]], a Californian rock band * [[Evening]] * [[Evi (disambiguation)]] * [[Evie (disambiguation)]] * [[Evy (disambiguation)]] * [[Ewe language]] or Eve * [[First woman (disambiguation)]] * [[Ive (disambiguation)]] * [[Yve]] * [[Yves (disambiguation)]]
{{disambiguation}} [[ko:이브]]
